versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Analyzes patterns in health symptoms

schema.prompt:
Analyze the following health symptom data to identify patterns and correlations:

Symptom History: {{input.symptomHistory}}
Timeframes: {{input.timeframes}}
Lifestyle Factors: {{input.lifestyleFactors}}
Environmental Factors: {{input.environmentalFactors}}
Dietary Information: {{input.dietaryInfo}}

Perform comprehensive pattern analysis:
1. Temporal patterns (time of day, day of week, seasonal)
2. Frequency analysis (how often symptoms occur)
3. Intensity patterns (severity fluctuations)
4. Correlation with lifestyle factors (sleep, stress, exercise)
5. Environmental correlations (weather, location, allergens)
6. Dietary correlations (foods, meal timing)
7. Activity correlations (physical activity, work patterns)
8. Symptom clustering (which symptoms occur together)
9. Trigger identification (common preceding events)
10. Improvement patterns (what helps symptoms)

IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER: This analysis is for informational tracking only and does not constitute medical advice. Always consult healthcare professionals for medical concerns.

Return as structured JSON with keys: temporalPatterns (object), frequencyAnalysis (object), correlations (array), identifiedTriggers (array), symptomClusters (array), improvementFactors (array), notablePatterns (array), trackingRecommendations (array), disclaimer.

props.placeholder: List symptoms with dates/times over the tracking period...
When symptoms occurred (dates, times of day)
Sleep patterns, stress levels, exercise routine...
Foods eaten, meal timing, dietary changes...

translations.description: Analyzes patterns in health symptom data to identify triggers and correlations
translations.instructions: Enter your symptom history with relevant lifestyle and environmental factors. The system will analyze patterns and correlations. Remember to consult healthcare providers for medical advice.
translations.name: Symptom Pattern Analyzer
